EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Bill (1323992556.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Bill,
Thanks for the update. Sounds like a good set-up! Enjoy the holiday.
Steve
From: bt [mailto:tuftew@aol.com] Sent: Wednesday, December 14, 2011 1:23 PM To: Steve Arhancet Subject: Re: MBO Partners Bill
Steve,
Yes, we have not spoken in a while. I am an independent consultant with SAIC in the areas of risk management, modeling, and strategic planning. I have been supporting their client, IRS, for about two years.
This is a good gig, allows me to work from home two days and on-site two days, the fifth day I golf.
Have a great holiday season. Regards,
Bill 202.441.5897
This is a PRIVATE message. This e-mail contains privileged and confidential information intended exclusively for the use of the addressee(s) named above. If you are not the intended recipient of this e-mail, or the employee or agent responsible for delivering it to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any dissemination, copying or other use of this e-mail and any attachments hereto is strictly prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error, please notify the sender immediately by telephone and delete this e-mail and any attachments from your system. Thank you.
-----Original Message----- From: Steven Arhancet <sarhancet@mbopartners.com> To: tuftew <tuftew@aol.com> Sent: Wed, Dec 14, 2011 11:01 am Subject: MBO Partners Bill Dear Bill, Its been some time since we last spoke with you, but I personally wanted to check in and share some news with you. We recently launched a new consultant-focused Web site which includes relevant tools such as a Bill Rate Calculator, a self-assessment tool on independence, and a video that shows how we help independents succeed in todays project economy. We encourage you to take a look. Whatever your work life stage, I also hope you can join me in celebrating the news that independent work life in America has arrived. Our company is well into a year-long effort called The State of Independence in America. I encourage you to view some very interesting findings on the size and trends for independent work in our nation. Please feel free to reply to this email and provide an update on how your contract search is going. Are you working on a project now or you currently working W2 at the moment? Steven Arhancet ___________________________________ Steve Arhancet Director, Consultant Services MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6011 f: 703.793.6081 e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
